titleStmt.title: Miscellanea ... by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Temple, William, Sir, 1628-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. and R.R. for Edw. Gellibrand ... ,

notesStmt.note: Written by William Temple. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.

(from t.p.) I. A survey of the constitutions and interests of the Empire, Sueden, Denmark, Spain, Holland, France, and Flanders, with their relation to England, in the year 1671 -- II. An essay upon the original and nature of government -- III. An essay upon the advancement of trade in Ireland -- IV. Upon the conjecture of affairs in Octob. 1673 -- V. Upon the excesses of grief -- VI. An essay upon the cure of gout by Moxa.
